snippet: Lawyers for Senator Robert Menendez of New Jersey have asked the Justice Department to investigate a possible connection.
abstract: Sen Robert Menendez, Democrat of New Jersey who is under scrutiny by the Justice Dept in a corruption investigation, suggests in letter to department that Cuban spies may be behind effort to discredit him and mute his support of tough sanctions against government in Havana; Menendez has said previously that his seat at helm of Senate Foreign Relations Committee has made him a target of Cuban operatives.
lead_paragraph: Lawyers for Senator Robert Menendez of New Jersey have asked the Justice Department to investigate a possible connection.

headline.main: Senator Sees Cuban Role in Corruption Inquiry
headline.print_headline: Senator Sees Cuban Role in Corruption Inquiry
